entry.value: # libraries required%%00010library("plotly")%%00010%%00010# data input%%00010data_annotation <- as.character(knime.in[,1])%%00010data_matrix <- as.matrix(knime.in[,2:ncol(knime.in)])%%00010#str(data_matrix)%%00010#str(data_annotation)%%00010%%00010zmin_usr <- knime.flow.in[["zmin_usr"]]%%00010zmax_usr <- knime.flow.in[["zmax_usr"]]%%00010%%00010pom <- knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]]%%00010%%00010# plotting%%00010if ((zmin_usr == 0)&& (zmax_usr == 0)) {%%00010knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]] <- plot_ly(x = colnames(data_matrix), %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009y = data_annotation,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009z = data_matrix, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009type = "heatmap", %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009zauto = TRUE) %>%%%00010%%00009 #zmin=round(min(data_matrix)),%%00010 #zmax=round(max(data_matrix))) %>%%%00010 layout(title = knime.flow.in[["graph_title"]]) %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009#zauto = FALSE, zmin = 000, zmax = 100)%%00010} else {%%00010knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]] <- plot_ly(x = colnames(data_matrix), %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009y = data_annotation,%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009z = data_matrix, %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009type = "heatmap", %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009zauto = FALSE,%%00010%%00009 zmin = zmin_usr,%%00010 zmax = zmax_usr) %>%%%00010 layout(title = knime.flow.in[["graph_title"]])%%00010}%%00010%%00010knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]]%%00010%%00010%%00010# plot saving%%00010# checks if user provided .html or not, if not, it will automatically append it to the name of file-to-be-saved%%00010if (grepl(".html", pom, fixed=TRUE) == TRUE) {%%00010 %%00009f1 <- paste(knime.flow.in[["plot_path"]],pom, sep="", collapse = NULL)%%00010} else {%%00010%%00009f <- paste(pom,".html", sep="",collapse = NULL)%%00010%%00009f1 <- paste(knime.flow.in[["plot_path"]],f, sep="", collapse = NULL)%%00010}%%00010%%00010htmlwidgets::saveWidget(as.widget(knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]]), f1, selfcontained=FALSE)%%00010#htmlwidgets::saveWidget(as.widget(knime.flow.in[["plot_save"]]), f1, selfcontained=TRUE)%%00010# output%%00010knime.out <- data_matrix

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
